name: Anime Doll Avatar Maker Game
description:
- Start your cartoon character creation and express your fashion sense

- Choose different skin tones, hair styles, face shapes, hair colors, expressions and more stylish dresses with more than 1000 decoration items.

- Make cartoon avatars with different expressions to express your emotions

- The creativity is unlimited, so that your anime game avatar is no longer monotonous

- Feel free to dress up in different styles, as long as you find it beautiful

- Don't forget to take a photo and save your creations to your phone

- Share it and update your social network avatars and boost all followers.

Anime dress-up in various styles & genres!
Custom avatar maker with full body, various poses and face features.
Cool girls, lovely maid, sweet lolita? What kind of role are you going to play today? Now you can make your own character and become a cool doll designer.

We will continue to add more style elements in the future. If you've any feedback for doll avatar, please feel free to send us your feedback. Wish you have moments of relaxation.
